00089 #if OTAU_BITCLOUD_LEGACY_SUPPORT == 1
00090 
00091 typedef struct
00092 {
00093 /* Size of internal subimage within main image
00094  * (for example size of eeprom area) */
00095   uint32_t  imageInternalLength;
00096 /* Amount bytes were received from internal information structute
00097  * about the internal subimage.  Should be 8 bytes. 4 byte mcu start
00098  * address of the subimage. 4 byte size of the subimage. */
00099   uint8_t   internalAddressStatus;
00100 /* Requested offset from the current file. */
00101   uint32_t  currentFileOffset;
00102 /* Size of requested data. */
00103   uint8_t   currentDataSize;
00104 /* Reminder of the not received data. */
00105   uint32_t  imageRemainder;
00106 /* Address of the page begin. Address form main image. */
00107   uint32_t  imagePageOffset;
00108 /* Page size of the last Image Page request. */
00109   uint16_t lastPageSize;
00110 } OtauImageAuxVar_t;
00111 
00112 typedef struct
00113 {
00114   uint8_t         imageBlockData[OFD_BLOCK_SIZE];
00115   uint32_t        imageSize;
00116   uint8_t        *imagePageData;
00117 } ZclOtauClientImageBuffer_t;
00118 #else
00119 
00120 typedef struct
00121 {
00122   /* Total Image Size to be downloaded/Currently Getting Downloaded */
00123   uint32_t  totalImageLength;
00124   /* Request(ed) File Offset. */
00125   uint32_t  requestFileOffset;
00126 
00127 #if APP_SUPPORT_OTAU_PAGE_REQUEST == 1
00128   /* Offset address of the missed Page being received*/
00129   uint32_t  currentPageOffset;
00130   uint8_t  totalReceivedBytesInPage;
00131   /*Contains all missed block offsests within that page*/
00132   uint8_t   missedBlockOffset[OTAU_MAX_MISSING_BLOCKS];
00133   /* Current offset within the page */
00134   uint8_t  imageBlockOffsetInPage;
00135   bool      isMissedBlock;
00136 #endif
00137 /* Size of block request(ed) */
00138   uint8_t   requestBlockSize;
00139 } OtauImageAuxVar_t;
00140

00197 #if OTAU_BITCLOUD_LEGACY_SUPPORT == 1
00198 typedef struct
00199 {
00200   // reqMem contains the memory structure for ZDO, APS and ZCL commands
00201   OtauReqMemory_t              reqMem;
00202 
00203   // zclReqMem contains the memory structure for request commands supported by the client side OTAU cluster
00204   OtauZclReqMemory_t           zclReqMem;
00205 
00207   // also i plan to use this for timing the image page req completion turnaround
00208   HAL_AppTimer_t               pageRequestTimer;
00209 
00210   // otauParam holds the image blocks/page and size received over the air
00211   ZclOtauClientImageBuffer_t   otauParam;
00212 
00213   // imageAuxParam holds the offset tracking, image breakage and current data size
00214   OtauImageAuxVar_t            imageAuxParam;
00215 
00216   // memParam holds the memory structure to facilitate operation of OTAU flash drive
00217   OFD_MemoryAccessParam_t      memParam;
00218 
00219   // newFirmwareVersion holds the version information of currently downloading image
00220   ZCL_OtauFirmwareVersion_t    newFirmwareVersion;
00221 
00222   // numbers of servers that responded during the discovery procedure
00223   uint8_t                      discoveredServerAmount;
00224 
00225   // OTAU server extended address
00226   ExtAddr_t                    otauServer;
00227 
00228   // information related to the discovered servers
00229   ZclOtauDiscoveryResult_t    *discoveredServerMem;
00230 
00231   // bit mask pointer to uint8_t to track the missed bytes in a page download
00232   uint8_t                     *missedBytesMask;
00233   // Otau Transcation retry count
00234   uint8_t                       retryCount;
00235   // miscellaneous help information
00236   struct
00237   {
00238     uint8_t                    blockRequest : 1;
00239     uint8_t                    missedBytesGetting : 1;
00240     uint8_t                    firstStart : 1;
00241     uint8_t                    blockRequestDelayOn : 1;
00242   };
00243   // imgtype field populated/read in the header/eeprom
00244   ZCL_OtauImageType_t          eepromImgType;
00245 /* Sequence number used for OTAU request */
00246   uint8_t otauReqSeqNum;
00247 } ZCL_OtauClientMem_t;
00248 
00249 #else
00250 typedef struct
00251 {
00252   // reqMem contains the memory structure for ZDO, APS and ZCL commands
00253   OtauReqMemory_t              reqMem;
00254 
00255   // zclReqMem contains the memory structure for request commands supported by the client side OTAU cluster
00256   OtauZclReqMemory_t           zclReqMem;
00258   // also i plan to use this for timing the image page req completion turnaround
00259   HAL_AppTimer_t                blockResponseWaitTimer;
00260 
00261   // otauParam holds the image blocks/page and size received over the air
00262   ZclOtauClientImageBuffer_t   otauParam;
00263 
00264   // imageAuxParam holds the offset tracking, image breakage and current data size

00266

00280 
00281   // numbers of servers that responded during the discovery procedure
